oc_lettings_site¶

oc_lettings_site.apps¶

This module provides app management for the website application. Classes:

  • OCLettingsSiteConfig: Handles the config of the website app.

class oc_lettings_site.apps.OCLettingsSiteConfig(app_name, app_module)¶

Bases: AppConfig

This class defines the configuration for the ‘oc_lettings_site’ app, including its name. Django uses this class to configure application-specific settings.

Attributes:

name (str): The name of the application, which Django uses to refer to the app internally.

name = 'oc_lettings_site'¶

oc_lettings_site.asgi¶

This module provides by Django manages the asgi server.

oc_lettings_site.settings¶

This module provides by Django manages the settings of the project.

oc_lettings_site.tests¶

This module provides tests for the website application.

class oc_lettings_site.tests.WebsiteAppTests(methodName='runTest')¶

Bases: TestCase

Test suite for the website application.

test_404_page()¶

This test ensures that the custom 404 page is displayed when a page is not found.

test_500_page(render)¶

This test ensures that the custom 500 page is displayed when there is a server error.

test_home_page_view()¶

This test ensures that the home page is accessible and returns a successful response.

test_home_page_view_sentry_logs(render, sentry)¶

This test forces an exception to be raised in the index view, ensuring that the exception handling is given to sentry.

oc_lettings_site.urls¶

This module provides urls for the website application. It manages the static part

oc_lettings_site.views¶

This module provides views for the website application. Functions:

  • index(): view for index page.

oc_lettings_site.views.index(request)¶

Render the index page for the website application. Args:

request (HttpRequest): The HTTP request object that contains metadata about the request.

Returns:

HttpResponse: The HTTP response object containing the rendered index page.

oc_lettings_site.wsgi¶

This module provides by Django manages the wsgi server.
